kubectl apply -f scaling/go-demo-5-api-hpa-low-mem.yml

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far awayâ€¦

Your applications

could not be scaled

You knew that your applications should be scaled

when users complained

You stared at

dashboards

to find out when to scale your applications

You created

scaling groups

You adopted

Kubernetes

You discovered

HorizontalPodAutoscaler

apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
spec:
  ...
  minReplicas: 2
  maxReplicas: 5
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      targetAverageUtilization: 80
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      targetAverageUtilization: 80

You discovered

HorizontalPodAutoscaler

kubectl -n go-demo-5 get hpa,pods

You learned that

memory and CPU

is not enough
